content: with the chart pattern for instep stitches only pu and knit into the purl bumps along other side of the heel flap knit to marker one round is complete now continue decreasing every other round as follows round 1 k to last 3 stitches on round 2 k one round even instep needle b k2tog k1 k instep in is in pattern pattern k1 ssk on needle b k to end of the round continue decrease rounds until you have 64 stitches knit foot until 1 5 less than desired foot length continuing with the chart for instep only toe round 1 round 2 needle a k1 ssk knit to last 3 knit one round even stitches k2tog k1 on needle b repeat until 12 stitches are left k1 ssk and knit to last 3 stitches and graft them together weave in k2tog k1 all your ends block as desire helpful tips the old norwegian cast on is a variation of the long tail cast on but there s an extra twist which makes it a bit stretchier it s also known as the german twisted cast on here s a helpful how to link https //www youtube com/watch v=bzvznt7f7my if you still find that the cuff is too tight use two needles for the cast on and just remove that second needle when you are ready to start knitting when joining stitches in the round you can create an invisible join this requires casting on 1 extra stitch here s the helpful how to link https //www youtube com/watch v=idghalaiuzq abbreviations k2tog knit 2 stitches together ws wrong side p2tog purl 2 stitches together pm place stitch marker ssk slip slip knit co cast on p purl pu pick up k knit - - purl p purl o yarn over sl slip / - k2tog rs right side \ - ssk pattern & photography by olivia villarreal for personal use only pattern support email olive villarreal@yahoo com right leaf lace chart left leaf lace chart charts are read from right to left bottom up the dark boxes denote no stitch this lace pattern changes the stitch count on your needles every other row
